InnerCircleGrew.title: Enkulungo zo eza Blink zikula!

InnerCircleAllTimeThresholdReached.title: Enkulungo ennungi ey'omunda! 🤙

OuterCircleAllTimeThresholdReached.title: Amagoba g'enkulungo ey'ebweru 💪
